en.name: Lithic Blade
en.passiveDescription: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a {{7//8//9//10//11%}} ATK increase and a {{3//4//5//6//7%}} CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
